description:
While it took Britain's highest court in the land to affirm the biological reality that trans women are men, the real scandal is that this needed to be done in the first place. Nonetheless, the goal post has officially swung in the direction of sanity, as the UK’s Supreme Court ruled what even cavemen always knew to be true.

The UK Supreme Court has ruled that trans women are not women.

The ruling means that those who are biologically male can be excluded on legal grounds from women’s bathrooms, sports, locker rooms, organizations, etc.

“The definition of sex in the Equality Act 2010 makes clear… https://t.co/84lYTYlQki
— Andy Ngo (@MrAndyNgo)
title: Landmark Supreme Court decision rules that trans women are not, in fact, women

description:
Patty Morin did not get one call from Senator Chris Van Hollen after an illegal immigrant murdered her daughter. And Hollen only pretended to care after Victor Martinez-Hernandez was convicted on Tuesday. Nonetheless, while he sat quietly during this unimaginable wait for justice for Morin's daughter, Rachel Morin, he had at least several tantrums to defend someone who should not even be here in the first place.

Hollen cares about Kilmar Abrego Garcia so much that he’s traveling to another country in hopes of bringing him back, despite breaking federal immigration laws.

Patty Morin went on Fox News and discussed her outrage over the fake sympathy for an illegal alien whom the
title: Watch: Angel Mom goes off on Democrat senator caring more about an illegal alien than he does her daughter who was murdered by one

description:
No. None of us has a newfound respect for Whoopi Goldberg. This is the same multi-millionaire who just last week said YOU aren't paying enough in taxes. There's still a cliche about broken clocks for a reason, and in the midst of the usual dingbattery we've come to know a bait clicks with when the shrill harpies from "The View" yak it up around the table, there was a fleeting moment of sanity.

Maybe someone replaced Whoopi's Centrum with red pills, but she came out in SUPPORT of Donald Trump defunding the Department of Education.

It's not just that she supports it, but how far she went.

Whoopi just discovered libertarianism 🤯🤣 https://t.co
title: Whoopi Goldberg shocks "The View" DEFENDING major Trump initiative, producers cut her off before getting too red-pilled

description:
Call me naive, but I really did wish the best for Joe Biden in his future endeavors. He su-diddly-ucked as a president, and we here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website enjoyed finding creative ways to document him never knowing where he was, how all these people got into his room, or who pooped his pants. But that's all so 2024. Maybe the time away from politics would do him good. Allow him to regain some of the wits that he lost over the years.

Nope.

What's left of Joe Biden spoke in Chicago on Tuesday. The Democrat Party, to push the lie that Donald Trump is going to eliminate social security, thought the 117-year-old former president would be the ideal person to speak on it. It was Biden's first public appearance since Trump's inauguration. He's old as f*ck. Who better to spread the usual Democrat lies anytime Republic
title: Dems make mistake of letting Joe Biden speak in public, where he calls Black Americans, quote, "colored"
